description: Number of distinct base 2 digits of n.
formula: This is 2 unless n = 2^k - 1 for some k in which case it is 1.
maple: A043529 := proc(n): if type(ln(n+1)/ln(2), integer) then 1 else 2 fi: end proc: seq(A043529(n), n=0..90); # Johannes W. Meijer, Sep 14 2012
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: First term added and offset changed by _Johannes W. Meijer_, May 15 2009
